title: "Project Outline"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment="")
```


```{r}
print_tree <- function(path = ".", prefix = "", exclude = c("renv", "kde-ranking.Rproj")) {
  items <- list.files(path, full.names = TRUE)
  items <- items[!basename(items) %in% exclude]
  items <- items[order(file.info(items)$isdir, items)]  # folders first
  
  for (i in seq_along(items)) {
    name <- basename(items[i])
    is_last <- i == length(items)
    connector <- if (is_last) "└── " else "├── "
    cat(prefix, connector, name, "\n", sep = "")
    
    if (dir.exists(items[i])) {
      new_prefix <- paste0(prefix, if (is_last) "    " else "│   ")
      print_tree(items[i], new_prefix)
    }
  }
}

# Usage (set this to your actual project path)
print_tree("~/PDev/kde-ranking")
```
